title: The Favorites - NFL Week 13 Best Bets
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 13 Best Bets
description:
It's lucky Week 13 for NFL bettors, and that means plenty of opportunities as Action Network Chief Content Officers welcomes his BFF, professional sports gambler Simon Hunter. Together they discuss juicy opportunities on the Pittsburgh Steelers, Buffalo Bills and so much more. Plus we hear about Sharp Calls Simon has received from his professional gambling buddies this week, plus totals, moneyline underdogs and survivor picks as the stretch run of the NFL season gets underway in earnest.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
